'''Beta 1.21.20.24''' (ChromeOS, Android) or '''Preview 1.21.20.24''' (Windows, iOS, iPadOS, Xbox, PlayStation) is the ninth and final beta/''Preview'' version for [[Bedrock Edition 1.21.20]], released on July 25, 2024,<ref>{{cite|url=https://feedback.minecraft.net/hc/en-us/articles/28705484708109|title=Minecraft Beta & Preview - 1.21.20.24|website=Minecraft Feedback|date=July 25, 2024}}</ref> which fixes bugs.

== Experimental ==
=== Changes ===
==== Technical ====
'''Graphical'''
* The Deferred Technical Preview no longer supports iOS or iPadOS devices older than the iPhone 8, iPad (8th generation), or iPad mini (5th generation).

== Fixes ==
{{fixes|project=MCPE|fixedin=1.21.20.24 Preview

|;previous
|181451|Switching "Shared packs" in the Edit World Screen Does Not Save Changes.
|183730|After rejoining the world, the player may face the wrong direction.
|183848|Newly placed chests disappear when turning away from them.
|183989|Particle with later format version has wrong default UV.}}</onlyinclude>
